Your army attacks an enemy army with a Strike against the enemy armyâ€™s AC. You can do so with a melee Strike only if you are engaged with the target army. Otherwise, you must use a ranged Strike.

An army can attempt a maximum of 5 ranged Strikes per war encounter (unless it has the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.kingmaker-features.Item.Increased Ammunition] tactic). As with any attack, multiple Strikes in a single round suffer a multiple attack penalty.

A siege engine can use the Battle action to attack and damage a fortification.

Critical Success You deal 2 points of damage to the army.

Success You deal 1 point of damage to the army.
